lines.text: [when her daughter's boyfriend Bobby has a cramp after being forced to strip for peeping on her mother]
Well, well, no wonder you're in so much pain. You have "lover's nuts", Bobby.
[touches them]

Oh, yeah, these balls are definitely engorged with fluid. I can make you feel better. Why should I? What's in it for me? You've been a bad boy. But, ah, maybe there is something nice you can do for Mrs. Goldblum.
Anything, please...
Anything?
[gives him a fellatio]

[approaching with a kitchen knife to her bedroom's curtain after seeing a peeper there]
Okay, you behind the curtain, I got a knife. Come out from behind there, you slimy little peeping tom.
[removing the curtain to see her daughter Peaches' boyfriend]
Bobby, it's you! Well, you slimy little perverted creep. Did you enjoy yourself watching me get undressed? Did you like that?
[Bobby signals no]
No? Did you like making me feel cheap? Ha? You little creep. Take your clothes off.
I can't do that...
Yes you can, and you will, and you'll start with your coat.
Please, Mrs. Goldblum. Don't make me...

Start with your coat. Come on, hurry up. Take your shirt off. We have to do something about creeps like you. Take your pants off so I can see your ugly little penis. Come on. Hurry up. Now you're gonna see what it feels like to be stripped down and stared at like a caged animal.
[suddenly Bobby has a cramp]
What's the matter with you, Bobby?
My balls...
Howard, would you like to tell me about your war wound?
Well, it is a... really nothing much to tell. I got shot in the head. See, right there?

[repulsed]
Yeah...
And I got a hard-on ever since.
No, that's not possible. You're pulling my leg.
No, pull something else. Here, quick, give me your hand.
